about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a full stack web developer specializing in React.js and Python, with hands-on experience building and deploying web applications. I led the development of LIQUIBOXES, an innovative e-commerce platform, and contributed to team projects like YO LO CUIDO.
about.description_2: My background in Mechanical Engineering enhances my approach to problem-solving and system architecture.
about.description_3: Based in Dublin, I combine technical skills with fluency in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. I am focused on contributing to impactful projects within a dynamic tech company while continuing to grow as a developer.

job1.title: Full Stack Developer & Team Lead
job1.description: Led a team of three developers in creating an innovative e-commerce platform. Architected and implemented the complete solution using React.js and Python/Flask. Key achievements: secure payment processing with Stripe, efficient database design with SQLAlchemy, and agile workflow setup. The project was awarded Best Project at 4Geeks Academy.

job2.title: Frontend Developer
job2.description: Built the frontend for YO LO CUIDO, a pet care services platform, using React and modern CSS practices. Collaborated with the UX/UI team to ensure pixel-perfect design implementation. Enhanced performance and implemented user authentication.

job3.title: R&D&I Project Consultant
job3.description: Specialized in analyzing technology projects focused on IT, video games, and animation. This role ignited my passion for software development through exposure to advanced technologies and development methodologies. I analyzed complex software architectures, collaborated with tech companies, and gained valuable insights into modern practices that inspired my transition to full-stack development.

project1.title: LIQUIBOXES
project1.description: Led the development of an e-commerce platform transforming inventory management with personalized mystery boxes. Built with React.js, Python/Flask, and PostgreSQL. Features include secure payment processing (Stripe), real-time inventory management, and an advanced recommendation system. CI/CD pipeline setup and code review via GitHub Actions.

project2.title: YO LO CUIDO
project2.description: Developed a responsive platform for pet care services connecting pet owners with caregivers. Built the frontend using React, custom hooks, and context API. Implemented user authentication, real-time notifications, and an intuitive booking system. Collaborated with the backend team for seamless API integration.

project3.title: Star Wars Database
project3.description: Created an interactive web application showcasing data from the Star Wars universe using React and Redux. Features include dynamic search, favorites system, and detailed character profiles. Integrated with SWAPI REST API and implemented efficient data caching for optimal performance.
